Name: Manuel Orme√±o
description:
Manuel is 36. He lives comfortably and happily in the city of Chincha. In order to get ahead he works as a helper in a small vegetable stall in the city market. Manuel works about 8 hours per day and thinks that it is going well for him in his work because he is responsible.
Manuel is grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their support he will be able to have enough money to be able to buy a plot of land. This way, he will be able to keep working and fighting to have his own home.
